title: Developing salespersons at PT Madi Kencana to increase ITS sales
abstract: The writer accomplished this paper to fulfill the requirement of studying at Petra Business English, Petra Christian University, Surabaya. The writer would like to praise God for his grace and mercy support, enabling the writer to finish the study at Petra Business English, Petra Christian Univesity, Surabaya. The writer also expresses gratitude to all Petra Business English teachers for their efforts to teach the students. And personally, the writer would like to express profound gratitude to Ms. Leniwati Slamet for her patience, guidance, and encouragement that enables the writer to finish this paper
